amendment.description: To allow tribal members to make their own health care choices.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4033 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4033 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1040) To allow tribal members to make their own health care choices.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4033 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
